 1354:     {error,_} = ssh:connect("localhost", Port, [{id_string,"Pelle "},
 1355:                                                 {save_accepted_host, false}], 1000),
 1356:     receive
 1357: 	{id,Server,"SSH-2.0-Pelle \r\n"} ->
 1358: 	    ok;
 1359: 	{id,Server,Other} ->
 1360: 	    ct:fail("Unexpected id: ~s.",[Other])
 1361:     after 5000 ->
 1362: 	    {fail,timeout}
 1363:     end.
 1364: 
 1365: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1366: id_string_random_client(Config) ->
 1367:     {Server, _Host, Port} = fake_daemon(Config),
 1368:     {error,_} = ssh:connect("localhost", Port, [{id_string,random},
 1369:                                                 {save_accepted_host, false}], 1000),
 1370:     receive
 1371: 	{id,Server,Id="SSH-2.0-Erlang"++_} ->
 1372: 	    ct:fail("Unexpected id: ~s.",[Id]);
 1373: 	{id,Server,Rnd="SSH-2.0-"++ID} when 4=<length(ID),length(ID)=<7 -> %% Add 2 for CRLF
 1374: 	    ct:log("Got correct ~s",[Rnd]);
 1375: 	{id,Server,Id} ->
 1376: 	    ct:fail("Unexpected id: ~s.",[Id])
 1377:     after 5000 ->
 1378: 	    {fail,timeout}
 1379:     end.
 1380: 
 1381: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1382: id_string_no_opt_server(Config) ->
 1383:     {_Server, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:std_daemon(Config, []),
 1384:     {ok,S1}=ssh_test_lib:gen_tcp_connect(Host,Port,[{active,false},{packet,line}]),
 1385:     {ok,"SSH-2.0-Erlang/"++Vsn} = gen_tcp:recv(S1, 0, 2000),
 1386:     true = expected_ssh_vsn(Vsn).
 1387: 
 1388: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1389: id_string_own_string_server(Config) ->
 1390:     {_Server, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:std_daemon(Config, [{id_string,"Olle"}]),
 1391:     {ok,S1}=ssh_test_lib:gen_tcp_connect(Host,Port,[{active,false},{packet,line}]),
 1392:     {ok,"SSH-2.0-Olle\r\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(S1, 0, 2000).
 1393: 
 1394: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1395: id_string_own_string_server_trail_space(Config) ->
 1396:     {_Server, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:std_daemon(Config, [{id_string,"Olle "}]),
 1397:     {ok,S1}=ssh_test_lib:gen_tcp_connect(Host,Port,[{active,false},{packet,line}]),
 1398:     {ok,"SSH-2.0-Olle \r\n"} = gen_tcp:recv(S1, 0, 2000).
 1399: 
 1400: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1401: id_string_random_server(Config) ->
 1402:     %% Check undocumented format of id_string. First a bad variant:
 1403:     {error,{eoptions,_}} = ssh:daemon(0, [{id_string,{random,8,6}}]),
 1404:     %% And then a correct one:
 1405:     {_Server, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:std_daemon(Config, [{id_string,{random,6,8}}]),
 1406:     {ok,S1}=ssh_test_lib:gen_tcp_connect(Host,Port,[{active,false},{packet,line}]),
 1407:     {ok,"SSH-2.0-"++Rnd} = gen_tcp:recv(S1, 0, 2000),
 1408:     case Rnd of
 1409: 	"Erlang"++_ -> ct:log("Id=~p",[Rnd]),
 1410: 		       {fail,got_default_id};
 1411: 	"Olle\r\n" -> {fail,got_previous_tests_value};
 1412: 	_ when 8=<length(Rnd),length(Rnd)=<10 -> %% Add 2 for CRLF
 1413: 	    ct:log("Got correct ~s",[Rnd]);
 1414: 	_ ->
 1415:             ct:log("Got wrong sized ~s.",[Rnd]),
 1416:             {fail,got_wrong_size}
 1417:     end.
 1418: 
 1419: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1420: ssh_connect_negtimeout_parallel(Config) -> ssh_connect_negtimeout(Config,true).
 1421: ssh_connect_negtimeout_sequential(Config) -> ssh_connect_negtimeout(Config,false).
 1422:     
 1423: ssh_connect_negtimeout(Config, Parallel) ->
 1424:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1425:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
 1426:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1427:     NegTimeOut = 2000,				% ms
 1428:     ct:log("Parallel: ~p",[Parallel]),
 1429: 
 1430:     {_Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},{user_dir, UserDir},
 1431:                                                {parallel_login, Parallel},
 1432:                                                {negotiation_timeout, NegTimeOut},
 1433:                                                {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
 1434: 
 1435:     {ok,Socket} = ssh_test_lib:gen_tcp_connect(Host, Port, []),
 1436: 
 1437:     Factor = 2,
 1438:     ct:log("And now sleeping ~p*NegTimeOut (~p ms)...", [Factor, round(Factor * NegTimeOut)]),
 1439:     ct:sleep(round(Factor * NegTimeOut)),
 1440:     
 1441:     case inet:sockname(Socket) of
 1442: 	{ok,_} -> 
 1443: 	    %% Give it another chance...
 1444: 	    ct:log("Sleep more...",[]),
 1445: 	    ct:sleep(round(Factor * NegTimeOut)),
 1446: 	    case inet:sockname(Socket) of
 1447: 		{ok,_} -> ct:fail("Socket not closed");
 1448: 		{error,_} -> ok
 1449: 	    end;
 1450: 	{error,_} -> ok
 1451:     end.
 1452: 
 1453: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1454: %%% Test that ssh connection does not timeout if the connection is established (parallel)
 1455: ssh_connect_nonegtimeout_connected_parallel(Config) ->
 1456:     ssh_connect_nonegtimeout_connected(Config, true).
 1457: 
 1458: %%% Test that ssh connection does not timeout if the connection is established (non-parallel)
 1459: ssh_connect_nonegtimeout_connected_sequential(Config) ->
 1460:     ssh_connect_nonegtimeout_connected(Config, false).
 1461: 
 1462: 
 1463: ssh_connect_nonegtimeout_connected(Config, Parallel) ->
 1464:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1465:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
 1466:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1467:     NegTimeOut = 2000,				% ms
 1468:     ct:log("Parallel: ~p",[Parallel]),
 1469:    
 1470:     {_Pid, _Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},{user_dir, UserDir},
 1471: 					       {parallel_login, Parallel},
 1472: 					       {negotiation_timeout, NegTimeOut},
 1473: 					       {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
 1474:     ct:log("~p Listen ~p:~p",[_Pid,_Host,Port]),
 1475:     ct:sleep(500),
 1476: 
 1477:     IO = ssh_test_lib:start_io_server(),
 1478:     Shell = ssh_test_lib:start_shell(Port, IO, [{user_dir,UserDir}]),
 1479:     receive
 1480: 	Error = {'EXIT', _, _} ->
 1481: 	    ct:log("~p",[Error]),
 1482: 	    ct:fail(no_ssh_connection);  
 1483: 	ErlShellStart ->
 1484: 	    ct:log("---Erlang shell start: ~p~n", [ErlShellStart]),
 1485: 	    one_shell_op(IO, NegTimeOut),
 1486: 	    one_shell_op(IO, NegTimeOut),
 1487: 
 1488: 	    Factor = 2,
 1489: 	    ct:log("And now sleeping ~p*NegTimeOut (~p ms)...", [Factor, round(Factor * NegTimeOut)]),
 1490: 	    ct:sleep(round(Factor * NegTimeOut)),
 1491:     
 1492: 	    one_shell_op(IO, NegTimeOut)
 1493:     after 
 1494: 	10000 -> ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
 1495:     end,
 1496:     exit(Shell, kill).
 1497: 
 1498: 
 1499: one_shell_op(IO, TimeOut) ->
 1500:     ct:log("One shell op: Waiting for prompter"),
 1501:     receive
 1502: 	ErlPrompt0 -> ct:log("Erlang prompt: ~p~n", [ErlPrompt0])
 1503:     after TimeOut -> ct:fail("Timeout waiting for promter")
 1504:     end,
 1505: 
 1506:     IO ! {input, self(), "2*3*7.\r\n"},
 1507:     receive
 1508: 	Result0 -> ct:log("Result: ~p~n", [Result0])
 1509:     after TimeOut ->  ct:fail("Timeout waiting for result")
 1510:     end.
 1511: 
 1512: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1513: max_log_item_len(Config) ->
 1514:     %% Find a supported algorithm (to be removed from the daemon):
 1515:     {ok, {Type,Alg}} = select_alg( ssh:default_algorithms() ),
 1516: 
 1517:     %% Start a test daemon without support for {Type,Alg}
 1518:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1519:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1520:     {_Pid, Host0, Port} =
 1521:         ssh_test_lib:daemon([
 1522:                              {system_dir, SystemDir},
 1523:                              {user_dir, UserDir},
 1524:                              {user_passwords, [{"carni", "meat"}]},
 1525:                              {modify_algorithms, [{rm, [{Type,[Alg]}]}]},
 1526:                              {max_log_item_len, 10}
 1527:                             ]),
 1528:     Host = ssh_test_lib:mangle_connect_address(Host0),
 1529:     ct:log("~p:~p Listen ~p:~p. Mangled Host = ~p",
 1530:            [?MODULE,?LINE,Host0,Port,Host]),
 1531: 
 1532:     {ok,ReportHandlerPid} = ssh_eqc_event_handler:add_report_handler(),
 1533: 
 1534:     %% Connect to it with the {Type,Alg} to force a failure and log entry:
 1535:     {error,_} = R =
 1536:         ssh:connect(Host, Port, 
 1537:                     [{preferred_algorithms, [{Type,[Alg]}]},
 1538:                      {max_log_item_len, 10},
 1539:                      {silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1540:                      {save_accepted_host, false},
 1541:                      {user_dir, UserDir},
 1542:                      {user_interaction, false},
 1543:                      {user, "carni"},
 1544:                      {password, "meat"}
 1545:                     ]),
 1546: 
 1547:     {ok, Reports} = ssh_eqc_event_handler:get_reports(ReportHandlerPid),
 1548:     ct:log("~p:~p ssh:connect -> ~p~n~p", [?MODULE,?LINE,R,Reports]),
 1549: 
 1550:     [ok] =
 1551:         lists:usort(
 1552:           [check_skip_part(
 1553:              string:tokens(
 1554:                lists:flatten(io_lib:format(Fmt,Args)),
 1555:                " \n"))
 1556:            || {info_msg,_,{_,Fmt,Args}} <- Reports]
 1557:           ).
 1558: 
 1559: 
 1560: check_skip_part(["Disconnect","...","("++_NumSkipped, "bytes","skipped)"]) ->
 1561:     ok;
 1562: check_skip_part([_|T]) ->
 1563:     check_skip_part(T);
 1564: check_skip_part([]) ->
 1565:     error.
 1566: 
 1567: select_alg([{Type,[A,_|_]}|_]) when is_atom(A) -> {ok, {Type,A}};
 1568: select_alg([{Type,[{Dir,[A,_|_]}, _]}|_]) when is_atom(A), is_atom(Dir) -> {ok, {Type,A}};
 1569: select_alg([{Type,[_,{Dir,[A,_|_]}]}|_]) when is_atom(A), is_atom(Dir) -> {ok, {Type,A}};
 1570: select_alg([_|Algs]) -> select_alg(Algs);
 1571: select_alg([]) -> false.
 1572: 
 1573: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1574: max_sessions_ssh_connect_parallel(Config) -> 
 1575:     max_sessions(Config, true, connect_fun(ssh__connect,Config)).
 1576: max_sessions_ssh_connect_sequential(Config) -> 
 1577:     max_sessions(Config, false, connect_fun(ssh__connect,Config)).
 1578: 
 1579: max_sessions_sftp_start_channel_parallel(Config) -> 
 1580:     max_sessions(Config, true, connect_fun(ssh_sftp__start_channel, Config)).
 1581: max_sessions_sftp_start_channel_sequential(Config) -> 
 1582:     max_sessions(Config, false, connect_fun(ssh_sftp__start_channel, Config)).
 1583: 
 1584: 
 1585: %%%---- helpers:
 1586: connect_fun(ssh__connect, Config) ->
 1587:     fun(Host,Port) ->
 1588: 	    ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, 
 1589: 				 [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1590: 				  {user_dir, proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config)},
 1591: 				  {user_interaction, false},
 1592: 				  {user, "carni"},
 1593: 				  {password, "meat"}
 1594: 				 ])
 1595: 	    %% ssh_test_lib returns R when ssh:connect returns {ok,R}
 1596:     end;
 1597: connect_fun(ssh_sftp__start_channel, _Config) ->
 1598:     fun(Host,Port) ->
 1599: 	    {ok,_Pid,ConnRef} =
 1600: 		ssh_sftp:start_channel(Host, Port, 
 1601: 				       [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1602:                                         {save_accepted_host, false},
 1603: 					{user, "carni"},
 1604: 					{password, "meat"}
 1605: 				       ]),
 1606: 	    ConnRef
 1607:     end.
 1608: 
 1609: 
 1610: max_sessions(Config, ParallelLogin, Connect0) when is_function(Connect0,2) ->
 1611:     Connect = fun(Host,Port) ->
 1612: 		      R = Connect0(Host,Port),
 1613: 		      ct:log("Connect(~p,~p) -> ~p",[Host,Port,R]),
 1614: 		      R
 1615: 	      end,
 1616:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
 1617:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1618:     MaxSessions = 5,
 1619:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([
 1620: 					     {system_dir, SystemDir},
 1621: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
 1622: 					     {user_passwords, [{"carni", "meat"}]},
 1623: 					     {parallel_login, ParallelLogin},
 1624: 					     {max_sessions, MaxSessions}
 1625: 					    ]),
 1626:     ct:log("~p Listen ~p:~p for max ~p sessions",[Pid,Host,Port,MaxSessions]),
 1627:     try [Connect(Host,Port) || _ <- lists:seq(1,MaxSessions)]
 1628:     of
 1629: 	Connections ->
 1630: 	    %% Step 1 ok: could set up max_sessions connections
 1631: 	    ct:log("Connections up: ~p",[Connections]),
 1632: 	    [_|_] = Connections,
 1633: 
 1634: 	    %% N w try one more than allowed:
 1635: 	    ct:log("Info Report expected here (if not disabled) ...",[]),
 1636: 	    try Connect(Host,Port)
 1637: 	    of
 1638: 		_ConnectionRef1 ->
 1639: 		    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
 1640: 		    {fail,"Too many connections accepted"}
 1641: 	    catch
 1642: 		error:{badmatch,{error,"Connection closed"}} ->
 1643:                     ct:log("Step 2 ok: could not set up too many connections. Good.",[]),
 1644: 		    %% Now stop one connection and try to open one more
 1645: 		    ok = ssh:close(hd(Connections)),
 1646: 		    try_to_connect(Connect, Host, Port, Pid)
 1647: 	    end
 1648:     catch
 1649: 	error:{badmatch,{error,"Connection closed"}} ->
 1650: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
 1651: 	    {fail,"Too few connections accepted"}
 1652:     end.
 1653: 
 1654: 
 1655: try_to_connect(Connect, Host, Port, Pid) ->
 1656:     {ok,Tref} = timer:send_after(30000, timeout_no_connection), % give the supervisors some time...
 1657:     try_to_connect(Connect, Host, Port, Pid, Tref, 1). % will take max 3300 ms after 11 tries
 1658: 
 1659: try_to_connect(Connect, Host, Port, Pid, Tref, N) ->
 1660:      try Connect(Host,Port)
 1661:      of
 1662: 	 _ConnectionRef1 ->
 1663: 	     timer:cancel(Tref),
 1664:              ct:log("Step 3 ok: could set up one more connection after killing one. That's good.",[]),
 1665: 	     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
 1666: 	     receive % flush. 
 1667: 		 timeout_no_connection -> ok
 1668: 	     after 0 -> ok
 1669: 	     end
 1670:      catch
 1671: 	 error:{badmatch,{error,"Connection closed"}} ->
 1672: 	     %% Could not set up one more connection. Try again until timeout.
 1673: 	     receive
 1674: 		 timeout_no_connection ->
 1675: 		     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
 1676: 		     {fail,"Does not decrease # active sessions"}
 1677: 	     after N*50 -> % retry after this time
 1678: 		     try_to_connect(Connect, Host, Port, Pid, Tref, N+1)
 1679: 	     end
 1680:      end.
 1681: 
 1682: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1683: max_sessions_drops_tcp_connects() ->
 1684:     [{timetrap,{minutes,2}}].
 1685: 
 1686: max_sessions_drops_tcp_connects(Config) ->
 1687:     MaxSessions = 20,
 1688:     UseSessions = 2, % Must be =< MaxSessions
 1689:     FloodSessions = 1000,
 1690:     ParallelLogin = true,
 1691:     NegTimeOut = 8*1000,
 1692:     HelloTimeOut = 200,
 1693: 
 1694:     %% Start a test daemon
 1695:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
 1696:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1697:     {Pid, Host0, Port} =
 1698:         ssh_test_lib:daemon([
 1699:                              {system_dir, SystemDir},
 1700:                              {user_dir, UserDir},
 1701:                              {user_passwords, [{"carni", "meat"}]},
 1702:                              {parallel_login, ParallelLogin},
 1703:                              {hello_timeout, HelloTimeOut},
 1704:                              {negotiation_timeout, NegTimeOut},
 1705:                              {max_sessions, MaxSessions}
 1706:                             ]),
 1707:     Host = ssh_test_lib:mangle_connect_address(Host0),
 1708:     ct:log("~p:~p ~p Listen ~p:~p for max ~p sessions. Mangled Host = ~p",
 1709:            [?MODULE,?LINE,Pid,Host0,Port,MaxSessions,Host]),
 1710:     
 1711:     %% Log in UseSessions connections
 1712:     SSHconnect = fun(N) ->
 1713:                          R = ssh:connect(Host, Port, 
 1714:                                          [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1715:                                           {save_accepted_host, false},
 1716:                                           {user_dir, proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config)},
 1717:                                           {user_interaction, false},
 1718:                                           {user, "carni"},
 1719:                                           {password, "meat"}
 1720:                                          ]),
 1721:                          ct:log("~p:~p ~p: ssh:connect -> ~p", [?MODULE,?LINE,N,R]),
 1722:                          R
 1723:                  end,
 1724: 
 1725:     L1 = oks([SSHconnect(N) || N <- lists:seq(1,UseSessions)]),
 1726:     case length(L1) of
 1727:         UseSessions ->
 1728:             %% As expected
 1729:             %% Try gen_tcp:connect
 1730:             [ct:log("~p:~p ~p: gen_tcp:connect -> ~p", 
 1731:                     [?MODULE,?LINE, N, gen_tcp:connect(Host, Port, [])])
 1732:              || N <- lists:seq(UseSessions+1, MaxSessions)
 1733:             ],
 1734: 
 1735:             ct:log("~p:~p Now try ~p gen_tcp:connect to be rejected", [?MODULE,?LINE,FloodSessions]),
 1736:             [ct:log("~p:~p ~p: gen_tcp:connect -> ~p", 
 1737:                     [?MODULE,?LINE, N, gen_tcp:connect(Host, Port, [])])
 1738:              || N <- lists:seq(MaxSessions+1, MaxSessions+1+FloodSessions)
 1739:             ],
 1740:             
 1741:             ct:log("~p:~p try ~p ssh:connect", [?MODULE,?LINE, MaxSessions - UseSessions]),
 1742:             try_ssh_connect(MaxSessions - UseSessions, NegTimeOut, SSHconnect);
 1743: 
 1744:         Len1 ->
 1745:             {fail, Len1}
 1746:     end.
 1747: 
 1748: try_ssh_connect(N, NegTimeOut, F) when N>0 ->
 1749:     case F(N) of
 1750:         {ok,_} ->
 1751:             try_ssh_connect(N-1, NegTimeOut, F);
 1752:         {error,_} when N==1 ->
 1753:             try_ssh_connect(N, NegTimeOut, F);
 1754:         {error,_} ->
 1755:             timer:sleep(NegTimeOut),
 1756:             try_ssh_connect(N, NegTimeOut, F)
 1757:     end;
 1758: try_ssh_connect(_N, _NegTimeOut, _F) ->
 1759:     done.
 1760: 
 1761: 
 1762: oks(L) -> lists:filter(fun({ok,_}) -> true;
 1763:                           (_) -> false
 1764:                        end, L).
 1765:     
 1766: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1767: save_accepted_host_option(Config) ->
 1768:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
 1769:     KnownHosts = filename:join(UserDir, "known_hosts"),
 1770:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),	  
 1771:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
 1772: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
 1773: 					     {user_passwords, [{"vego", "morot"}]}
 1774:                                             ]),
 1775:     {error,enoent} = file:read_file(KnownHosts),
 1776: 
 1777:     {ok,_C1} = ssh:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1778:                                         {save_accepted_host, false},
 1779:                                         {user, "vego"},
 1780:                                         {password, "morot"},
 1781:                                         {user_interaction, false},
 1782:                                         {user_dir, UserDir}]),
 1783:     {error,enoent} = file:read_file(KnownHosts),
 1784:     
 1785:     {ok,_C2} = ssh:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1786:                                         {user, "vego"},
 1787:                                         {password, "morot"},
 1788:                                         {user_interaction, false},
 1789:                                         {user_dir, UserDir}]),
 1790:     {ok,_} = file:read_file(KnownHosts),
 1791:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
 1792: 
 1793: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1794: raw_option(_Config) ->
 1795:     Opts = [{raw,1,2,3,4}],
 1796:     #{socket_options := Opts} = ssh_options:handle_options(client, Opts),
 1797:     #{socket_options := Opts} = ssh_options:handle_options(server, Opts).
 1798: 
 1799: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1800: config_file(Config) ->
 1801:     %% First find common algs:
 1802:     ServerAlgs = ssh_test_lib:default_algorithms(sshd),
 1803:     OurAlgs = ssh_transport:supported_algorithms(), % Incl disabled but supported
 1804:     CommonAlgs = ssh_test_lib:intersection(ServerAlgs, OurAlgs),
 1805:     ct:log("ServerAlgs =~n~p~n~nOurAlgs =~n~p~n~nCommonAlgs =~n~p",[ServerAlgs,OurAlgs,CommonAlgs]),   
 1806:     Nkex = length(proplists:get_value(kex, CommonAlgs, [])),
 1807: 
 1808:     %% Adjust for very old ssh daemons that only supports ssh-rsa and ssh-dss:
 1809:     AdjustClient =
 1810:         case proplists:get_value(public_key,ServerAlgs,[]) -- ['ssh-rsa','ssh-dss'] of
 1811:             [] ->
 1812:                 %% Old, let the client support them also:
 1813:                 ct:log("Adjust the client's public_key set", []),
 1814:                 [{public_key, ['ssh-rsa','ssh-dss']}];
 1815:             [_|_] ->
 1816:                 %% Ok, let the client be un-modified:
 1817:                 []
 1818:         end,
 1819: 
 1820:     case {ServerAlgs, ssh_test_lib:some_empty(CommonAlgs)} of
 1821:         {[],_} ->
 1822:             {skip, "No server algorithms found"};
 1823:         {_,true} ->
 1824:             {fail, "Missing common algorithms"};
 1825:         _ when Nkex<3 ->
 1826:             {skip, "Not enough number of common kex"};
 1827:         _ ->
 1828:             %% Then find three common kex and one common cipher:
 1829:             [K1a,K1b,K2a|_] = proplists:get_value(kex, CommonAlgs),
 1830:             [{_,[Ch1|_]}|_] = proplists:get_value(cipher, CommonAlgs),
 1831: 
 1832:             %% Make config file:
 1833:             {ok,ConfFile} = 
 1834:                 make_config_file_in_privdir(
 1835:                   "c2.config", Config,
 1836:                   [{ssh, [{preferred_algorithms,
 1837:                            [{cipher, [Ch1]},
 1838:                             {kex,    [K1a]}
 1839:                            ] ++ AdjustClient},
 1840:                           {client_options,
 1841:                            [{modify_algorithms,
 1842:                              [{rm,     [{kex, [K1a]}]},
 1843:                               {append, [{kex, [K1b]}]}
 1844:                              ]}
 1845:                            ]}
 1846:                          ]}
 1847:                   ]),
 1848: 
 1849:             %% Start the slave node with the configuration just made:
 1850:             {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(["-config", ConfFile]),
 1851: 
 1852:             R0 = rpc:call(Node, ssh, default_algorithms, []),
 1853:             ct:log("R0 = ~p",[R0]),
 1854:             R0 = ssh:default_algorithms(),
 1855: 
 1856:             %% Start ssh on the slave. This should apply the ConfFile:
 1857:             rpc:call(Node, ssh, start, []),
 1858: 
 1859:             R1 = rpc:call(Node, ssh, default_algorithms, []),
 1860:             ct:log("R1 = ~p",[R1]),
 1861:             [{kex,[K1a]},
 1862:              {public_key,_},
 1863:              {cipher,[{_,[Ch1]},
 1864:                       {_,[Ch1]}]} | _] = R1,
 1865: 
 1866:             %% First connection. The client_options should be applied:
 1867:             {ok,C1} = rpc:call(Node, ssh, connect, [loopback, ?SSH_DEFAULT_PORT,
 1868:                                                     [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1869:                                                      {save_accepted_host, false},
 1870:                                                      {user_interaction, false}
 1871:                                                     ]]),
 1872:             ct:log("C1 = ~n~p", [C1]),
 1873:             {algorithms,As1} = rpc:call(Node, ssh, connection_info, [C1, algorithms]),
 1874:             K1b = proplists:get_value(kex, As1),
 1875:             Ch1 = proplists:get_value(encrypt, As1),
 1876:             Ch1 = proplists:get_value(decrypt, As1),
 1877:             {options,Os1} = rpc:call(Node, ssh, connection_info, [C1, options]),
 1878:             ct:log("C1 algorithms:~n~p~n~noptions:~n~p", [As1,Os1]),
 1879: 
 1880:             %% Second connection, the Options take precedence:
 1881:             C2_Opts = [{modify_algorithms,[{rm,[{kex,[K1b]}]}, % N.B.
 1882:                                            {append, [{kex,[K2a]}]}]},
 1883:                        {silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1884:                        {save_accepted_host, false},
 1885:                        {user_interaction, false}
 1886:                       ],
 1887:             {ok,C2} = rpc:call(Node, ssh, connect, [loopback, ?SSH_DEFAULT_PORT, C2_Opts]),
 1888:             {algorithms,As2} = rpc:call(Node, ssh, connection_info, [C2, algorithms]),
 1889:             K2a = proplists:get_value(kex, As2),
 1890:             Ch1 = proplists:get_value(encrypt, As2),
 1891:             Ch1 = proplists:get_value(decrypt, As2),
 1892:             {options,Os2} = rpc:call(Node, ssh, connection_info, [C2, options]),
 1893:             ct:log("C2 opts:~n~p~n~nalgorithms:~n~p~n~noptions:~n~p", [C2_Opts,As2,Os2]),
 1894: 
 1895:             peer:stop(Peer)
 1896:     end.
 1897:     
 1898: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
 1899: config_file_modify_algorithms_order(Config) ->
 1900:     %% First find common algs:
 1901:     ServerAlgs = ssh_test_lib:default_algorithms(sshd),
 1902:     OurAlgs = ssh_transport:supported_algorithms(), % Incl disabled but supported
 1903:     CommonAlgs = ssh_test_lib:intersection(ServerAlgs, OurAlgs),
 1904:     ct:log("ServerAlgs =~n~p~n~nOurAlgs =~n~p~n~nCommonAlgs =~n~p",[ServerAlgs,OurAlgs,CommonAlgs]),
 1905:     Nkex = length(proplists:get_value(kex, CommonAlgs, [])),
 1906:     case {ServerAlgs, ssh_test_lib:some_empty(CommonAlgs)} of
 1907:         {[],_} ->
 1908:             {skip, "No server algorithms found"};
 1909:         {_,true} ->
 1910:             {fail, "Missing common algorithms"};
 1911:         _ when Nkex<3 ->
 1912:             {skip, "Not enough number of common kex"};
 1913:         _ ->
 1914:             %% Then find three common kex and one common cipher:
 1915:             [K1,K2,K3|_] = proplists:get_value(kex, CommonAlgs),
 1916:             [{_,[Ch1|_]}|_] = proplists:get_value(cipher, CommonAlgs),
 1917: 
 1918:             %% Make config file:
 1919:             {ok, ConfFile} =
 1920:                 make_config_file_in_privdir(
 1921:                   "c3.config", Config,
 1922:                   [{ssh, [{preferred_algorithms,
 1923:                            [{cipher, [Ch1]},
 1924:                             {kex,    [K1]}
 1925:                            ]},
 1926:                           {server_options,
 1927:                            [{modify_algorithms,
 1928:                              [{rm,     [{kex, [K1]}]},
 1929:                               {append, [{kex, [K2]}]}
 1930:                              ]}
 1931:                            ]},
 1932:                           {client_options,
 1933:                            [{modify_algorithms,
 1934:                              [{rm,     [{kex, [K1]}]},
 1935:                               {append, [{kex, [K3]}]}
 1936:                              ]}
 1937:                            ]}
 1938:                          ]}
 1939:                   ]),
 1940: 
 1941:             %% Start the slave node with the configuration just made:
 1942:             {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(["-config", ConfFile]),
 1943:     
 1944:             R0 = rpc:call(Node, ssh, default_algorithms, []),
 1945:             ct:log("R0 = ~p",[R0]),
 1946:             R0 = ssh:default_algorithms(),
 1947: 
 1948:             %% Start ssh on the slave. This should apply the ConfFile:
 1949:             ok = rpc:call(Node, ssh, start, []),
 1950:             R1 = rpc:call(Node, ssh, default_algorithms, []),
 1951:             ct:log("R1 = ~p",[R1]),
 1952:             [{kex,[K1]} | _] = R1,
 1953: 
 1954:             %% Start a daemon
 1955:             {Server, Host, Port} = rpc:call(Node, ssh_test_lib, std_daemon, [Config, []]),
 1956:             {ok,ServerInfo} = rpc:call(Node, ssh, daemon_info, [Server]),
 1957:             ct:log("ServerInfo =~n~p", [ServerInfo]),
 1958: 
 1959:             %% Test that the server_options env key works:
 1960:             [K2] = proplists:get_value(kex,
 1961:                    proplists:get_value(preferred_algorithms,
 1962:                    proplists:get_value(options, ServerInfo))),
 1963:             
 1964:             {badrpc, {'EXIT', {{badmatch,ExpectedError}, _}}} =
 1965:                 %% No common kex algorithms expected. 
 1966:                 rpc:call(Node, ssh_test_lib, std_connect, [Config, Host, Port, []]), 
 1967:             {error,"Key exchange failed"} = ExpectedError,
 1968: 
 1969:             C = rpc:call(Node, ssh_test_lib, std_connect,
 1970:                          [Config, Host, Port, 
 1971:                           [{modify_algorithms,[{append,[{kex,[K2]}]}]}]]),
 1972:             ConnInfo = rpc:call(Node, ssh, connection_info, [C]),
 1973:             ct:log("ConnInfo =~n~p", [ConnInfo]),
 1974:             Algs = proplists:get_value(algorithms, ConnInfo),
 1975:             ct:log("Algs =~n~p", [Algs]),
 1976:             ConnOptions = proplists:get_value(options, ConnInfo),
 1977:             ConnPrefAlgs = proplists:get_value(preferred_algorithms, ConnOptions),
 1978: 
 1979:             %% And now, are all levels applied in right order:
 1980:             [K3,K2] = proplists:get_value(kex, ConnPrefAlgs),
 1981: 
 1982:             peer:stop(Peer)
 1983:     end.
 1984: 
 1985:     
 1986: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1987: daemon_replace_options_simple(Config) ->
 1988:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1989: 
 1990:     UserDir1 = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
 1991:     UserDir2 = filename:join(UserDir1, "foo"),
 1992:     file:make_dir(UserDir2),
 1993: 
 1994:     {Pid, _Host, _Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
 1995:                                                {user_dir, UserDir1}
 1996:                                               ]),
 1997:     {ok,Opts1} = ssh:daemon_info(Pid),
 1998:     UserDir1 = proplists:get_value(user_dir, proplists:get_value(options,Opts1,[])),
 1999: 
 2000:     {ok, Pid} = ssh:daemon_replace_options(Pid, [{user_dir,UserDir2}]),
 2001:     {ok,Opts2} = ssh:daemon_info(Pid),
 2002:     case proplists:get_value(user_dir, proplists:get_value(options,Opts2,[])) of
 2003:         UserDir2 ->
 2004:             ok;
 2005:         UserDir1 ->
 2006:             ct:log("~p:~p Got old value ~p~nExpected ~p", [?MODULE,?LINE,UserDir1,UserDir2]),
 2007:             {fail, "Not changed"};
 2008:         Other ->
 2009:             ct:log("~p:~p Got ~p~nExpected ~p", [?MODULE,?LINE,Other,UserDir2]),
 2010:             {fail, "Strange value"}
 2011:     end.
 2012: 
 2013: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2014: daemon_replace_options_algs(Config) ->
 2015:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2016:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
 2017: 
 2018:     DefaultKex =
 2019:         ssh_transport:default_algorithms(kex),
 2020:     NonDefaultKex =
 2021:         ssh_transport:supported_algorithms(kex) -- DefaultKex,
 2022: 
 2023:     case NonDefaultKex of
 2024:         [A1|_] ->
 2025:             [A2,A3|_] = DefaultKex,
 2026:             {Pid, _Host, _Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
 2027:                                                        {user_dir, UserDir},
 2028:                                                        {preferred_algorithms,[{kex,[A1]}]}
 2029:                                                       ]),
 2030:             [A1] = get_preferred_algorithms(Pid, kex),
 2031:             {ok, Pid} =
 2032:                 ssh:daemon_replace_options(Pid, [{modify_algorithms,
 2033:                                                   [{prepend,[{kex,[A2]}]}]
 2034:                                                  }
 2035:                                                 ]),
 2036:             [A2,A1] = get_preferred_algorithms(Pid, kex),
 2037: 
 2038:             {ok, Pid} =
 2039:                 ssh:daemon_replace_options(Pid, [{preferred_algorithms,[{kex,[A3]}]
 2040:                                                  }
 2041:                                                 ]),
 2042:             [A2,A3] = get_preferred_algorithms(Pid, kex)
 2043:             ;
 2044:         [] ->
 2045:             {skip, "No non-default kex"}
 2046:     end.
 2047: 
 2048: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2049: daemon_replace_options_algs_connect(Config) ->
 2050:     [A1,A2|_] =
 2051:         ssh_transport:default_algorithms(kex),
 2052: 
 2053:     {Pid, Host, Port} =
 2054:         ssh_test_lib:std_daemon(Config,
 2055:                                 [{preferred_algorithms,[{kex,[A1]}]}
 2056:                                 ]),
 2057:     [A1] = get_preferred_algorithms(Pid, kex),
 2058: 
 2059:     %% Open a connection with A1 as kex and test it
 2060:     C1 =
 2061:         ssh_test_lib:std_connect(Config, Host, Port,
 2062:                                  [{preferred_algorithms,[{kex,[A1]}]}
 2063:                                  ]),
 2064:     ok = test_connection(C1),
 2065:     ok = test_not_connect(Config, Host, Port,
 2066:                           [{preferred_algorithms,[{kex,[A2]}]}
 2067:                           ]),
 2068: 
 2069:     %% Change kex to A2
 2070:     {ok, Pid} =
 2071:         ssh:daemon_replace_options(Pid,
 2072:                                    [{preferred_algorithms,[{kex,[A2]}]}]),
 2073:     [A2] = get_preferred_algorithms(Pid, kex),
 2074: 
 2075:     %% and open the second connection with this kex, and test it
 2076:     C2 =
 2077:         ssh_test_lib:std_connect(Config, Host, Port,
 2078:                                  [{preferred_algorithms,[{kex,[A2]}]}
 2079:                                  ]),
 2080:     ok = test_connection(C2),
 2081:     ok = test_not_connect(Config, Host, Port,
 2082:                           [{preferred_algorithms,[{kex,[A1]}]}
 2083:                           ]),
 2084: 
 2085:     %% Test that the first connection is still alive:
 2086:     ok = test_connection(C1),
 2087: 
 2088:     ssh:close(C1),
 2089:     ssh:close(C2),
 2090:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
 2091: 
 2092: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2093: daemon_replace_options_algs_conf_file(Config) ->
 2094:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2095:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(user_dir, Config),
 2096: 
 2097:     DefaultKex =
 2098:         ssh_transport:default_algorithms(kex),
 2099:     NonDefaultKex =
 2100:         ssh_transport:supported_algorithms(kex) -- DefaultKex,
 2101: 
 2102:     case NonDefaultKex of
 2103:         [A0,A1|_] ->
 2104:             %% Make config file:
 2105:             {ok,ConfFile} =
 2106:                 make_config_file_in_privdir(
 2107:                   "c4.config", Config,
 2108:                   [{ssh, [{modify_algorithms,
 2109:                            %% Whatever happens, always put A0 first in the kex list:
 2110:                            [{prepend, [{kex, [A0]}]}
 2111:                            ]}
 2112:                          ]}
 2113:                   ]),
 2114: 
 2115:             [A2|_] = DefaultKex,
 2116:             ct:log("[A0, A1, A2] = ~p", [[A0, A1, A2]]),
 2117: 
 2118:             %% Start the slave node with the configuration just made:
 2119:             {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(["-config", ConfFile]),
 2120: 
 2121:             %% Start ssh on the slave. This should apply the ConfFile:
 2122:             rpc:call(Node, ssh, start, []),
 2123: 
 2124:             {Pid, _Host, _Port} =
 2125:                 rpc:call(Node, ssh_test_lib, daemon,
 2126:                          [
 2127:                           [{system_dir, SysDir},
 2128:                            {user_dir, UserDir},
 2129:                            {preferred_algorithms,[{kex,[A1]}]}
 2130:                           ]
 2131:                          ]),
 2132: 
 2133:             [A0,A1] =
 2134:                 rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, get_preferred_algorithms, [Pid, kex]),
 2135:             {ok, Pid} =
 2136:                 rpc:call(Node, ssh, daemon_replace_options,
 2137:                          [Pid,
 2138:                           [{modify_algorithms,
 2139:                             [{prepend,[{kex,[A2]}]}]
 2140:                            }
 2141:                           ]
 2142:                          ]),
 2143: 
 2144:             %% Check that the precedens order is fulfilled:
 2145:             [A2,A0,A1] =
 2146:                 rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, get_preferred_algorithms, [Pid, kex]),
 2147: 
 2148:             peer:stop(Peer);
 2149:         [] ->
 2150:             {skip, "No non-default kex"}
 2151:     end.
 2152: 
 2153: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2154: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
 2155: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2156: 
 2157: expected_ssh_vsn(Str) ->
 2158:     try
 2159: 	{ok,L} = application:get_all_key(ssh),
 2160: 	proplists:get_value(vsn,L,"")++"\r\n"
 2161:     of
 2162: 	Str -> true;
 2163: 	"\r\n" -> true;
 2164: 	_ -> false
 2165:     catch
 2166: 	_:_ -> true %% ssh not started so we don't know
 2167:     end.
 2168: 	    
 2169: 
 2170: fake_daemon(_Config) ->
 2171:     Parent = self(),
 2172:     %% start the server
 2173:     Server = spawn(fun() ->
 2174: 			   {ok,Sl} = gen_tcp:listen(0,[{packet,line}]),
 2175: 			   {ok,{Host,Port}} = inet:sockname(Sl),
 2176: 			   ct:log("fake_daemon listening on ~p:~p~n",[Host,Port]),
 2177: 			   Parent ! {sockname,self(),Host,Port},
 2178: 			   Rsa = gen_tcp:accept(Sl),
 2179: 			   ct:log("Server gen_tcp:accept got ~p",[Rsa]),
 2180: 			   {ok,S} = Rsa,
 2181: 			   receive
 2182: 			       {tcp, S, Id} -> Parent ! {id,self(),Id}
 2183: 			   after 
 2184: 			       10000 -> ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
 2185: 			   end
 2186: 		   end),
 2187:     %% Get listening host and port
 2188:     receive
 2189: 	{sockname,Server,ServerHost,ServerPort} -> {Server, ServerHost, ServerPort}
 2190:     after 
 2191: 	10000 -> ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
 2192:     end.
 2193: 
 2194: 
 2195: make_config_file_in_privdir(FileName, Config, Contents) ->
 2196:     %% write the file:
 2197:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2198:     ConfFile = filename:join(PrivDir, FileName),
 2199:     {ok,D} = file:open(ConfFile, [write]),
 2200:     io:format(D, "~p.~n", [Contents]),
 2201:     file:close(D),
 2202:     {ok,Cnfs} = file:read_file(ConfFile),
 2203:     ct:log("Config file ~p :~n~s", [ConfFile,Cnfs]),
 2204:     {ok,ConfFile}.
 2205: 
 2206: 
 2207: get_preferred_algorithms(Pid, Type) ->
 2208:     {ok,#{preferred_algorithms:=As}} = ssh_system_sup:get_acceptor_options(Pid),
 2209:     proplists:get_value(Type, As).
 2210: 
 2211: test_connection(C) ->
 2212:     {ok, Ch} = ssh_connection:session_channel(C, infinity),
 2213:     A = rand:uniform(100),
 2214:     B = rand:uniform(100),
 2215:     A_plus_B = lists:concat([A,"+",B,"."]),
 2216:     Sum = integer_to_binary(A+B),
 2217:     success = ssh_connection:exec(C, Ch, A_plus_B, infinity),
 2218:     expected = ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_result(
 2219:                  {ssh_cm, C, {data, Ch, 0, Sum}} ),
 2220:     ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_end(C, Ch),
 2221:     ok.
 2222: 
 2223: test_not_connect(Config, Host, Port, Opts) ->
 2224:     try
 2225:         ssh_test_lib:std_connect(Config, Host, Port, Opts)
 2226:     of
 2227:         Cx when is_pid(Cx) -> {error, connected}
 2228:     catch
 2229:         error:{badmatch, {error,_}} -> ok
 2230:     end.
 2231:
